biography.firstAppearance: (as alien costume) Secret Wars #8, (behind the scenes) Web of Spider-Man #18, (actual appearance) Amazing Spider-Man #300

work.occupation: Vigilante; former journalist for the Daily Globe, government operative

connections.relatives: Eddie Brock: Carl Brock (father), Jamie Brock (mother), Anne Weying (She-Venom, ex wife, deceased); Venom symbiote: Carnage (bonded to Cletus Kasidy, 1st generation offspring), five forced offspring - one independant (bonded to Donna, last name unrevealed, 1st generation offspring), four forming a composite symbiote (Hybrid (bonded to Scott Washington, 1st generation offspring), Toxin (bonded to Patrick Mulligan, 2nd generation offspring)
